attributes.action: Make cbd available for all conditions not just ms and epilepsy.
attributes.additional_details:
Medications 
Pregabalin gabapentine tramadol baclofen carbomazapine zopyclone are all the pills I used to take all at maximum does yet no effect other than totally changing my personality and day to day life 
Even doctors have said carry on taking the cbd so why can it not be prescribed is beyond me. So starting this petition in the hope that things will change for myself and he millions of people that suffer with chronic pain can finally get a drug that works. Please sign and thanks in advance.
attributes.background: I am a c7 quadriplegic who had a etc at age of 17 and suffered with neuropathic pain ever since. Pharmaceuticals have done nothing to ease this chronic pain over the years up until finding cbd which has changed my life for the better yet can’t get prescribed it. This needs to change
